  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_88999</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_88999</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Origine du pétrole et du gaz</string>
            <string language="en">Origin of oil and gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ursprung des Öls und des Gases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Origem do óleo e do gás</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Origine di petrolio e di gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προέλευση του πετρελαίου και αέριο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Origen del aceite y del gas</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Quatrième illustration sur quatre montrant la  formation du pétrole et du gaz. Est montrée ici, la mer où des animaux qui se transformeront en combustibles fossiles quand il seront morts au fil du temps, vivent.</string>
            <string language="en">This is fourth of four illustrations showing the formation of oil and gas underground. Here, the sea where animals, that turns into fossil fuels when dead over time, lives is shown.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Animaux</string>
            <string language="en">Animals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">combustible fossile</string>
            <string language="en">fossil fuel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">fossiles</string>
            <string language="en">fossils</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">gaz</string>
            <string language="en">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pétrole</string>
            <string language="en">oil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">mer</string>
            <string language="en">sea</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist Viertel von vier Abbildungen, welche 
die Anordnung von Öl- und Gasuntergrund zeigen. Hier das Meer, 
wo Tiere, diese Umdrehungen in Fossilbrennstoffe, wenn Totüberzeit, 
Leben gezeigt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é fourth de quatro ilustrações que 
mostram a formação do subterrâneo do óleo e do gás. Aqui, o
mar onde animais, esses voltas em combustíveis fossil quando o tempo 
excedente dos mortos, vidas for mostrado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un quarto di quattro illustrazioni 
che mostrano la formazione del underground del gas e del petrolio. 
Qui, il mare dove animali, quei girate nei combustibili fossili 
quando col tempo dei morti, vite è indicato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι τέταρτο τεσσάρων απεικονίσεων που 
εμφανίζουν το σχηματισμό του πετρελαίου και αέριο υπόγεια. 
Εδώ, η θάλασσα όπου τα ζώα, αυτό μετατρέπονται σε 
απολιθωμένα καύσιμα όταν νεκροί κατά τη διάρκεια του χρόνου, 
ζωές εμφανίζεται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es cuarto de cuatro ilustraciones que 
muestran la formación del subterráneo del aceite y del gas. 
Aquí, el mar donde animales, esos vueltas en los combustibles 
fósiles cuando se muestra en un cierto plazo los muertos, vidas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tiere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fossilbrennstoff</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fossilien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Öl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
